Name: Forest Ore
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Treecko, Grovyle, and Sceptile.  Swap a Treeck-Thorn and a Treeck-Card for a Forest Ore at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
